overview: Daniel and Summer went to the Pacific Ocean for a honeymoon, but unfortunately they met the gangsters. Daniel was severely injured and was thrown into the sea. Fortunately, Summer was rescued by the villagers. Daniel ticketed to a desert island and was rescued and taken care of by a foreign girl on the island. Daniel woke up and lost her memory. Daniel and the girl Winter had a long time and decided to hold a wedding. At the same time, Summer came to the fore. Knowing that her husband suffered from amnesia, she decided to stay, but seeing her husband sharing with others, she was not a taste, she planned to leave, and Winter also found him...
title: Summer Kiss, Winter Tear
